if(OS_WINDOWS)
  if(NOT MINGW)
    add_subdirectory(w32-pthreads)
  endif()
  add_subdirectory(ipc-util)
endif()

add_subdirectory(glad)

add_subdirectory(obs-scripting)
add_subdirectory(opts-parser)

add_subdirectory(uthash)
